reviewText:
I think this DVD has some fantastic interviews that let you see into the lives of the writers of popular worship songs.  You see some of the cool history behind some of the songs.  I was encouraged to keep my faith in perspective as a writer.

I personally was not a fan of the narration between interviews, it seemed kind of superficial and contrived.  However the narrator brought up some great points that would help a beginning or self-taught writer.
